thread.title: 1/30 PBE Update: Blood Moon Talon Splash Art
thread.title_full: 1/30 PBE Update: Blood Moon Talon Splash Art

author: Moobeat (noreply@blogger.com)
title: 1/30 PBE Update: Blood Moon Talon Splash Art
text:
[ Recent News :  Blood Moon Talon Splash on Twitter  ]

[This is a  W ORK  I N  P ROGRESS POST .] [ Status : The PBE  is back up and online.]

The PBE has been updated! As we continue the 7.3 PBE cycle, tonight's update includes the Blood Moon Talon splash art, several tentative balance changes, and more!
Continue reading for more information!

( Warning : PBE Content is tentative and subject to change - what you see below may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers at the end of the cycle! Manage your expectations accordingly.)

Table of Contents Blood Moon Talon Splash Miscellaneous Balance Changes 
Blood Moon Talon Splash Blood Moon Talon's splash art is now on the PBE - Alex Flores is the artist. 
[ Loading Screen ] 
Miscellaneous Blood Moon Jhin summoner icon flipped. 
[ Comparison ] 
Hunt of the Blood Moon (upcoming game mode in testing) background asset added to LCU. 


Balance Changes *  Remember  *: The PBE is a testing grounds for new, tentative, and sometimes radical or experimental changes. Be aware that what you see below may be lacking context or other changes that didn't make it in or were implemented in an earlier patch this cycle! These are  not  official notes.

Champions Cho'Gath 
Feast (R)  [previous changes reverted - ManWolfAxeBoss noted these exploratory changes are not ready for 7.3 and will likely return to the PBE soon. - "Pulling Cho changes from 7.3. Not quite ready to ship this patch, but should be back soon. Thanks for the feedback everyone!"] Ivern 
Triggerseed (E) cooldown reverted to 12/11/10/9/8 from 10 at all ranks.  
Rengar 
Thrill of the Hunt (R)  [duration changed again, changed in an earlier PBE update this cycle] [vs PBE] increased to 12/16/20 from 10/15/20 [vs Live] lowered to 12/16/20 from 14/22/30 
Check out  [ THIS PAGE ]  for a  comprehensive list of the new content & changes currently on the PBE as a part of this cycle  or catch up with the individual update links below !
1/24 PBE Update: Blood Moon Diana, Jhin, Talon, and Twisted Fate, "Assassin Mode", and more! 1/25 PBE Update Blood Moon summoner icons, Hunt for the Blood Moon Game Mode, and more! 1/26 PBE Update: BM SR Loading Screen, BM Diana tweaks, tentative balance changes, and more!  1/27 PBE Update: Blood Moon Jhin splash art, Blood Moon Diana Login Theme, and more!  [ BACK TO TOP ]
